comprehensive_overview: Elemental is a high-performance software library for distributed-memory dense linear algebra that aims to provide high performance and high productivity when performing complex linear algebra operations in parallel on large-scale computational platforms.
core_features: Efficient distributed-memory algorithms for dense linear algebra operations
Support for a wide range of matrix factorizations, solvers, and numerical algorithms
Designed for high performance on large-scale parallel computing systems
Open-source and actively maintained by a dedicated development team
